name: Open Source HardWare Library - SELECTION
tagline: OSHW documents for everyone to enjoy
body:
**no content yet, check out [OSHWL *candidates*](http://oshwl.github.io/candidates/)**

#*SELECTION*

**selected documents about [Open-Source Hardware](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Open-source_hardware) for everyone to enjoy**

the idea behind OSHWL is to document -in a structured, readable fashion- the existing constellation of OSHW projects, so that OSHW actors can make stuff in a smarter way.

candidate documents for OSHW *SELECTION* can be found in [OSHWL *candidates*](http://oshwl.github.io/candidates/). everyone is welcome to meddle with them or add new ones!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
